About Mariya

Investor, Financial Professional & Lifelong Learner

I am an investor managing my own family funds, based in Switzerland. My investment philosophy is global and long-term focused with aim to compound value over decades.

Professional Experience

Prior to turning my investing passion into a profession, I had a decade of experience working in various corporate finance roles in Swiss Re, the top tier global reinsurer.

Education & Development

I hold a MSc degree in Accounting & Finance from Umeå University, Sweden. Most recently, I followed the Value Investing Program of Stanford University and the executive Value Investing Program of Columbia University.

Areas of Interest

I am interested in learning more about P&C (re-)insurance, rating agencies, serial acquirers, cloud computing, digital payments and online retail.

Personal

I am a life-long learner, a cheerful thinker and a lucky mother of two young kids. If you think you can teach me something, please reach out.
